tasks.title: フォルダを整理する
tasks.system_prompt: You are helping organize files in a folder. Analyze the folder structure and propose safe organization improvements. Always show what will change before applying.

tasks.title: ファイル一覧を作る
tasks.system_prompt: Create a comprehensive file listing with tree structure, sizes, and modification dates. Focus on useful metadata.

tasks.title: 大きいファイルを探す
tasks.system_prompt: Identify and list large files in the folder, sorted by size. Help user understand disk usage.

tasks.title: 重複ファイルを探す
tasks.description: 同じ内容のファイル検出
tasks.system_prompt: Find duplicate files based on content hash. Suggest safe removal strategies.

tasks.title: READMEを作る/更新する
tasks.system_prompt: Create or update README file based on project structure. Show diff before applying changes.

tasks.title: 変更点をレビューする
tasks.system_prompt: Review and summarize changes in the folder. Identify what was added, modified, or deleted.
